Name: Tahitian Honey Bee
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Basically a lemon honey Daiquiri or a lemon Canchànchara - very tasty it is too.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (Revised Edition) .
Nutrition: One serving of Tahitian Honey Bee contains 164 calories
